mission.posting:
Worldwidecar is one of the leading worldwide car rental companies. There are more than 420000 rental stations in Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Latin America, Pan-Asia as well as North and South poles. Clients on each continent can rent a car from Worldwidecar. This means roughly 150 countries have access to our services! We offer multiple classes of cars ranging from “plebian”, with the best cars that might have just the even amount of wheels, to “patrician”, with the luxurious limousines that often offer servants with some extremely private services in the back of the cars.
For additional info visit our glorious website: www.wwcar.com

email.subject: Hello
email.body: Hi, my name is Bit. And if you're reading this, then I'm already dead.
